name: Hoaka Naivalu
story: Hoaka Naivalu was born in Saint Martin, an island in the Caribbean. He joined the French Foreign Legion at the age of 18 and served for 5 years before being honorably discharged. He then became a security guard for several high-profile clients before joining the NATO-backed Independent Forces in Arma 3. Hoaka is a skilled marksman with the machine gun and takes pride in his ability to protect his team at all costs.
